script.dataSelect: select table_name as name, table_catalog as catalog_name, table_schema as schema_name from information_schema.tables
script.templatesSelect: select column_name, column_default, case is_nullable when 'YES' then 'true' else 'false' end as nullable, data_type from information_schema.columns where table_name='$name$' and table_schema='$schema_name$' and table_catalog='$catalog_name$'
